StatisticalReportTableType.label: Metadata Record Statistics
StatisticalReportTableType.description: The number of records per record type.
StatisticalReportTableType.author: interactive instruments GmbH

rowExpressions.expression: for $record in $records let $rt := $record/gmd:hierarchyLevel[1]/gmd:MD_ScopeCode/@codeListValue group by $rt order by $rt return '' || $rt || '; ' || count($record)
